name: Anvilwrought Raptor
languages: understands one language of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Keen Sight
entries: The raptor has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

traits.name: Recorded Mimicry
entries: The raptor can mimic any sound, including voices, it has heard in the last 24 hours. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 12} Wisdom (Insight) check.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The raptor makes two attacks with its beak.

actions.name: Beak
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3 damage) piercing damage.
